summary: Completed FP6 - Equity Curve visualization testing for SPX Forward Performance. Backend APIs working perfectly, frontend integration has data loading issues preventing display.

integration_issues.issue: ForwardPerformanceCompact component stuck in loading state for SPX data
DataCloneError: Failed to execute 'postMessage' on 'Window': Request object could not be cloned

ui_bugs.issue: Missing FP6 equity curve visualization - no 'Equity Curve' text, canvas elements, or trade metrics displayed

passed_tests: Backend /api/fractal/spx/forward/summary returns correct FP5 metrics (60% hit rate, 40 samples)
Backend /api/fractal/spx/forward/equity returns complete FP6 equity curve (40 trades, 60% win rate, 9.1% max DD)
SPX fractal page loads and shows correct SPX-specific UI elements
SPX navigation and tabs work properly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend data loading issues: 1) Resolve DataCloneError in useFocusPack/useConsensusPulse hooks preventing API calls, 2) Ensure ForwardPerformanceCompact component properly renders SPX equity curve when isSpx=true, 3) Verify equityCurve state is properly set from API response

success_percentage.frontend: 20% - Page loads and navigation works, but equity curve not displaying due to data loading issues
